text: Today on the West Coast, conditions are poor with 8 ft @15s WNW swell and fresh 26 mph SSW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow sees a slight increase in swell to 11 ft @13s but remains messy with 25 mph SW winds. The day after, the swell drops to 6 ft @10s, still affected by fresh 29 mph SSE winds, keeping it choppy. Best: none.
